Kayako - ticket id 60251281 // ATLAS commented publicly: Dear Kai,

Thank you for reaching out and informing us of your need for a replacement Gensym G2 license associated with your 2011 subscription and existing contract.

To proceed and ensure we process your request efficiently, could you kindly provide the following required details:

- The current license information:
- Version
- Type (e.g., Development, Restricted, Runtime, or Embedded)
- Expiration date (if applicable)
- Server details:
- Server name
- Current version
- License identifier
- Your specific requirements:
- Type of license being requested (e.g., Site License in English)
- Any features or additional specifications needed
- Additional documentation, if available:
- Authorization form (please attach directly if possible)
- Any other relevant documents or context
- Reference to previous correspondence or related ticket numbers (if applicable)

If it is more convenient, you may simply reply to this email with the requested information or documentation attached.

This ticket will remain open for another week should you require additional time to gather the details.

Sincerely, 
ATLAS 
Gensym Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Closed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.
